General.Name: San Lien Technology
General.Description: Sanlien Technology Corp. provides environment monitoring and micro-vibration detection products, and system integration services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers sensor products, including analog accelerometers, amplifiers, angle sensors, annular load cells, crackmeters, displacement transducers, inclinometer casings, load cells, strain gauges, switch boxes, tiltcasts, tiltviews, torque transducers, VW piezometers, and VWdots. It also provides recorder products, which include cube onsite control and display interface, main control units, switch boxes, and VW Hubs. Sanlien Technology Corp. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
